content:
I don't feel physical exhaustion, but i can provide you with some useful tips to keep your energy levels high while playing basketball:

1. stay hydrated: keep drinking plenty of water to avoid dehydration during the game.

2. eat the right foods: make sure to have a healthy and balanced diet consisting of complex carbs, proteins, and healthy fats.

3. take enough rest: get adequate sleep the day before the game to maintain your energy levels. also, take breaks during the game to avoid exhaustion.

4. warm-up: do proper warm-up exercises before the game to prevent early fatigue and increase blood flow.

5. use energy-boosting supplements: you can use supplements like caffeine or energy drinks to boost your energy levels. however, make sure to use them sparingly and not depend solely on them for energy.
